DOC.criteria: Is least 20 year age Is refer contrastenhanced MRI body/extremities base current clinical symptom result previous imaging procedure Is willing undergo routine contrastenhanced MRI examination Is willing able complete study procedure specify protocol Subject male , female childbearing potential , female childbearing potential use medically accept mean contraception negative urine pregnancy test prior administration gadobutrol Magnevist Is female subject pregnant nursing Has receive investigational product participate clinical trial within 2 week prior enrol study Has previously enrol study study use gadobutrol Has contraindication MRI examination use Gdcontaining contrast agent Has history severe allergic anaphylactoid reaction allergen include drug contrast agent Has receive contrast agent within 24 hour prior study MRI Has glomerular filtration rate value < 30 mL/min/1.73m2 derive serum creatinine result within 4 week prior study enrollment Is consider clinically unstable his/her clinical course study period unpredictable ( eg , due previous surgery , acute renal failure ) Has severe cardiovascular disease ( eg , acute myocardial infarction ( < 14 day ) , unstable angina , congestive heart failure New York Heart Association class IV ) acute stroke ( < 48 hour ) Patients acute renal insufficiency severity due hepatorenal syndrome perioperative liver transplantation period Has contraindication Magnevist accord package insert
